AI_INSTRUCTIONS: Use available information to create 2-6 testimonials in the testimonials array. Use the provided icon for all authors
headerSubText: A short description of the section goes here. Should talk about what people are saying about the company.

testimonials.body: The body for the first testimonial goes here. It should be a short paragraph about what the person is saying about the company.

author.name: Name of the first person
author.source: Source of the review. For example, Google, Facebook, etc.
